newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish Jan-May trade deficit falls.
newsitem.headline: Turkish Jan-May trade deficit falls.

text.p: Turkey's foreign trade deficit fell 2.7 percent to $7.83 billion in the first five months of this year over the same 1996 period, the State Institute of Statistics said.
It said exports rose 9.4 percent to $9.79 billion and imports 3.6 percent to $17.62 billion in January-May.
